Linea.Char: Article 18 — Registration requirements

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 18 — Betingelser for registrering

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Protocol and regulations shall specify the requirements, including the criteria for the identification of the object:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Protokollen og reglementet fastsætter, hvilke betingelser, herunder kriterier for identificering af formuegenstanden, der skal være opfyldt for at:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: for effecting a registration (which shall include provision for prior electronic transmission of any consent from any person whose consent is required under Article 20);

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: a)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: foretage en registrering (hvilket skal inkludere bestemmelse om forudgående elektronisk transmission af ethvert samtykke fra enhver person, hvis samtykke er påkrævet efter artikel 20)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: for making searches and issuing search certificates, and, subject thereto;

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: b)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: foretage søgninger og udstede søgningsattester og, med forbehold heraf

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: for ensuring the confidentiality of information and documents of the International Registry other than information and documents relating to a registration.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: c)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: sikre fortroligheden af oplysningerne og dokumenterne i det internationale register, bortset fra oplysninger og dokumenter vedrørende en registrering.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Registrar shall not be under a duty to enquire whether a consent to registration under Article 20 has in fact been given or is valid.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Den rettighedsregistrerende myndighed har ikke pligt til at kontrollere, om et samtykke til registrering som omhandlet i artikel 20 faktisk er blevet givet eller er gyldigt.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Where an interest registered as a prospective international interest becomes an international interest, no further registration shall be required provided that the registration information is sufficient for a registration of an international interest.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Når en sikkerhedsrettighed, der er registreret som en fremtidig international sikkerhedsrettighed, overgår til at blive en international sikkerhedsrettighed, kræves der ingen yderligere registrering, forudsat at oplysningerne vedrørende registreringen er tilstrækkelige til registrering af en international sikkerhedsrettighed.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Registrar shall arrange for registrations to be entered into the International Registry data base and made searchable in chronological order of receipt, and the file shall record the date and time of receipt.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Den rettighedsregistrerende myndighed sikrer, at registreringerne indføres i det internationale registers database og gøres søgbare i kronologisk orden efter modtagelsestidspunkt, og at basen registrerer dato og klokkeslæt for modtagelsen.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Protocol may provide that a Contracting State may designate an entity or entities in its territory as the entry point or entry points through which the information required for registration shall or may be transmitted to the International Registry.
A Contracting State making such a designation may specify the requirements, if any, to be satisfied before such information is transmitted to the International Registry.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Det kan i protokollen bestemmes, at en kontraherende stat på sit område kan udpege et eller flere organer, der skal fungere som kontaktpunkt eller kontaktpunkter, hvorigennem de oplysninger, der kræves for registrering, kan eller skal videregives til det internationale register.
En kontraherende stat, der foretager en sådan udpegning, kan fastsætte, om og i givet fald hvilke betingelser der skal være opfyldt, før oplysningerne kan videregives til det internationale register.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 19 — Validity and time of registration

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 19 — Gyldigheden af en registrering og registreringstidspunkt

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: A registration shall be valid only if made in conformity with Article 20.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En registrering er kun gyldig, hvis den er foretaget i overensstemmelse med artikel 20.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: A registration, if valid, shall be complete upon entry of the required information into the International Registry data base so as to be searchable.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En registrering er, hvis den er gyldig, fuldstændig, når de krævede oplysninger er indført i det internationale registers database på en sådan måde, at den er søgbar.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: A registration shall be searchable for the purposes of the preceding paragraph at the time when:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Med henblik på anvendelsen af stk. 2 er en registrering søgbar, når

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: the International Registry has assigned to it a sequentially ordered file number;
and

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: a)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: det internationale register har tildelt den et løbenummer, og

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: the registration information, including the file number, is stored in durable form and may be accessed at the International Registry.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: b)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: oplysningerne vedrørende registreringen, herunder løbenummeret, opbevares i en varig form og kan tilgås ved det internationale register.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: If an interest first registered as a prospective international interest becomes an international interest, that international interest shall be treated as registered from the time of registration of the prospective international interest provided that the registration was still current immediately before the international interest was constituted as provided by Article 7.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Hvis en sikkerhedsrettighed, der oprindelig blev registreret som en fremtidig international sikkerhedsrettighed, overgår til at blive en international sikkerhedsrettighed, anses den for registreret på tidspunktet for registreringen af den fremtidige internationale sikkerhedsrettighed, forudsat at denne registrering stadig eksisterede, umiddelbart før den internationale sikkerhedsrettighed blev stiftet i medfør af artikel 7.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The preceding paragraph applies with necessary modifications to the registration of a prospective assignment of an international interest.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Stk. 4 finder med de fornødne tilpasninger tilsvarende anvendelse på registrering af en fremtidig overdragelse af en international sikkerhedsrettighed.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: A registration shall be searchable in the International Registry data base according to the criteria prescribed by the Protocol.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Der skal kunne foretages søgning efter en registrering i det internationale registers database i medfør af de kriterier, der er fastsat i protokollen.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 20 — Consent to registration

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 20 — Samtykke til registrering

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: An international interest, a prospective international interest or an assignment or prospective assignment of an international interest may be registered, and any such registration amended or extended prior to its expiry, by either party with the consent in writing of the other.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En international sikkerhedsrettighed, en fremtidig international sikkerhedsrettighed, en overdragelse af en international sikkerhedsrettighed eller en fremtidig overdragelse af en international sikkerhedsrettighed kan registreres, og denne registrering kan ændres eller forlænges, inden den udløber, af en af de to parter med den anden parts skriftlige samtykke.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The subordination of an international interest to another international interest may be registered by or with the consent in writing at any time of the person whose interest has been subordinated.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En international sikkerhedsrettigheds rykning for en anden international sikkerhedsrettighed kan registreres af den person, hvis sikkerhedsrettighed rykker, eller med dennes skriftlige samtykke, der kan gives til enhver tid.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: A registration may be discharged by or with the consent in writing of the party in whose favour it was made.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En registrering kan ophæves af den, til hvis fordel den er foretaget, eller med dennes skriftlige samtykke.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The acquisition of an international interest by legal or contractual subrogation may be registered by the subrogee.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Erhvervelse af en international sikkerhedsrettighed gennem lovbestemt eller aftalemæssig subrogation kan registreres af den, der indtræder i rettigheden.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: A registrable non-consensual right or interest may be registered by the holder thereof.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En ikke-aftalemæssig rettighed eller sikkerhedsrettighed, der kan registreres, kan registreres af indehaveren af denne.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: A notice of a national interest may be registered by the holder thereof.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En meddelelse om en national sikkerhedsrettighed kan registreres af indehaveren af sikkerhedsrettigheden.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 21 — Duration of registration

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 21 — Registreringens gyldighedsperiode

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Registration of an international interest remains effective until discharged or until expiry of the period specified in the registration.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Registrering af en international sikkerhedsrettighed forbliver i kraft, indtil den ophæves, eller indtil den gyldighedsperiode, der er fastsat i registreringen, udløber.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 22 — Searches

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 22 — Søgninger

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Any person may, in the manner prescribed by the Protocol and regulations, make or request a search of the International Registry by electronic means concerning interests or prospective international interests registered therein.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Enhver kan på de vilkår, der er fastsat i protokollen og reglementet, foretage eller anmode om at få foretaget en elektronisk søgning i det internationale register angående de sikkerhedsrettigheder eller fremtidige internationale sikkerhedsrettigheder, der er registreret heri.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Upon receipt of a request therefor, the Registrar, in the manner prescribed by the Protocol and regulations, shall issue a registry search certificate by electronic means with respect to any object:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Når den rettighedsregistrerende myndighed modtager en anmodning om søgning vedrørende en formuegenstand, udsteder den på de vilkår, der er fastsat i protokollen og reglementet, elektronisk en attest om søgning i registret:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: stating all registered information relating thereto, together with a statement indicating the date and time of registration of such information;
or

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: a)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: som gengiver alle de oplysninger, der er registreret om den pågældende formuegenstand, samt angiver dato og klokkeslæt for registreringen af disse oplysninger, eller

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: stating that there is no information in the International Registry relating thereto.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: b)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: som konstaterer, at der ikke findes nogen oplysninger om den pågældende formuegenstand i det internationale register.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: A search certificate issued under the preceding paragraph shall indicate that the creditor named in the registration information has acquired or intends to acquire an international interest in the object but shall not indicate whether what is registered is an international interest or a prospective international interest, even if this is ascertainable from the relevant registration information.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En søgningsattest, der er udstedt i medfør af stk. 2, skal angive, at den kreditor, hvis navn fremgår af oplysningerne vedrørende registreringen, har erhvervet eller agter at erhverve en international sikkerhedsrettighed vedrørende formuegenstanden, men skal ikke angive, om registreringen vedrører en international sikkerhedsrettighed eller en fremtidig international sikkerhedsrettighed, selv om dette kan fastslås på basis af de relevante oplysninger vedrørende registreringen.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 23 — List of declarations and declared non-consensual rights or interests

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 23 — Liste over erklæringer og ikke-aftalemæssige rettigheder eller sikkerhedsrettigheder

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Registrar shall maintain a list of declarations, withdrawals of declaration and of the categories of nonconsensual right or interest communicated to the Registrar by the Depositary as having been declared by Contracting States in conformity with Articles 39 and 40 and the date of each such declaration or withdrawal of declaration.
Such list shall be recorded and searchable in the name of the declaring State and shall be made available as provided in the Protocol and regulations to any person requesting it.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Den rettighedsregistrerende myndighed udarbejder på grundlag af oplysninger fra depositaren en liste over de erklæringer, tilbagetrækninger af erklæringer og kategorier af ikke-aftalemæssige rettigheder eller sikkerhedsrettigheder, som de kontraherende stater har anmeldt i medfør af artikel 39 og 40, med angivelse af dato for hver erklæring eller tilbagetrækning af erklæring.

Denne liste skal registreres, og der skal kunne foretages søgninger i den efter navnet på den stat, der har afgivet erklæringen, ligesom den skal stilles til rådighed for alle, der anmoder derom, på de vilkår, der er fastsat i protokollen og reglementet.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 24 — Evidentiary value of certificates

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 24 — Attesternes bevisværdi

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: A document in the form prescribed by the regulations which purports to be a certificate issued by the International Registry is prima facie proof:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Et dokument, der opfylder formkravene i reglementet og som fremtræder som en attest, der er udstedt af det internationale register, udgør et simpelt formodningsbevis:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: that it has been so issued;
and

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: a)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: for, at det er udstedt af det internationale register, og

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: of the facts recited in it, including the date and time of a registration.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: b)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: for de oplysninger, der er angivet i dokumentet, herunder dato og klokkeslæt for registreringen.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 25 — Discharge of registration

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 25 — Ophævelse af registrering

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Where the obligations secured by a registered security interest or the obligations giving rise to a registered non-consensual right or interest have been discharged, or where the conditions of transfer of title under a registered title reservation agreement have been fulfilled, the holder of such interest shall, without undue delay, procure the discharge of the registration after written demand by the debtor delivered to or received at its address stated in the registration.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Når forpligtelser, der er sikret ved en registreret sikkerhedsrettighed, eller forpligtelser, der er omfattet af en registreret ikke-aftalemæssig rettighed eller sikkerhedsrettighed, er indfriet, eller når betingelserne for overførelse af en ejendomsret i medfør af en registreret aftale, der indeholder et ejendomsforbehold, er opfyldt, ophæver indehaveren af en sådan sikkerhedsrettighed uden unødigt ophold registreringen på skriftlig anmodning fra debitor leveret eller modtaget på den i registreringen angivne adresse.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Where a prospective international interest or a prospective assignment of an international interest has been registered, the intending creditor or intending assignee shall, without undue delay, procure the discharge of the registration after written demand by the intending debtor or assignor which is delivered to or received at its address stated in the registration before the intending creditor or assignee has given value or incurred a commitment to give value.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Når en fremtidig international sikkerhedsrettighed eller en fremtidig overdragelse af en international sikkerhedsrettighed er registreret, ophæver den fremtidige kreditor eller cessionar uden unødigt ophold registreringen på skriftlig anmodning fra den fremtidige debitor eller cedent, leveret eller modtaget på den i registreringen angivne adresse, inden den fremtidige kreditor eller cessionar erlægger et forskud eller forpligter sig til at gøre det.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Where the obligations secured by a national interest specified in a registered notice of a national interest have been discharged, the holder of such interest shall, without undue delay, procure the discharge of the registration after written demand by the debtor delivered to or received at its address stated in the registration.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Når forpligtelser sikret ved en national sikkerhedsrettighed, der er nærmere angivet i en registreret meddelelse om en national sikkerhedsrettighed, er indfriet, ophæver indehaveren af denne sikkerhedsrettighed uden unødigt ophold registreringen på skriftlig anmodning fra debitor leveret eller modtaget på den i registreringen angivne adresse.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Where a registration ought not to have been made or is incorrect, the person in whose favour the registration was made shall, without undue delay, procure its discharge or amendment after written demand by the debtor delivered to or received at its address stated in the registration.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Når en registrering ikke burde være foretaget, eller når en registrering er ukorrekt, ophæver eller korrigerer den person, til hvis fordel registreringen er foretaget, uden unødigt ophold denne på skriftlig anmodning fra debitor leveret eller modtaget på den i registreringen angivne adresse.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 26 — Access to the international registration facilities

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 26 — Adgang til international registrering

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: No person shall be denied access to the registration and search facilities of the International Registry on any ground other than its failure to comply with the procedures prescribed by this Chapter.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En person kan kun nægtes adgang til registrering eller søgning i det internationale register, hvis den pågældende ikke følger de procedurer, der er fastsat i dette kapitel.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Privileges and immunities of the Supervisory Authority and the Registrar

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Tilsynsmyndighedens og den rettighedsregistrerende myndigheds privilegier og immuniteter

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 27 — Legal personality;
immunity

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 27 — Status som juridisk person;
immunitet

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Supervisory Authority shall have international legal personality where not already possessing such personality.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Tilsynsmyndigheden skal have status som international juridisk person, hvis dette ikke allerede er tilfældet.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Supervisory Authority and its officers and employees shall enjoy such immunity from legal or administrative process as is specified in the Protocol.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Tilsynsmyndigheden samt dennes ledelse og ansatte nyder immunitet over for ethvert retsligt eller administrativt skridt i overensstemmelse med protokollens bestemmelser.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Supervisory Authority shall enjoy exemption from taxes and such other privileges as may be provided by agreement with the host State.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: a)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Tilsynsmyndigheden indrømmes fritagelse for skatter samt sådanne andre privilegier, som er fastsat i aftalen indgået med værtslandet.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: For the purposes of this paragraph, “host State” means the State in which the Supervisory Authority is situated.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: b)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: I dette stykke forstås ved »værtsland« den stat, hvor tilsynsmyndigheden har sæde.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The assets, documents, data bases and archives of the International Registry shall be inviolable and immune from seizure or other legal or administrative process.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Det internationale registers ejendom, dokumenter, databaser og arkiver er ukrænkelige og kan ikke gøres til genstand for beslaglæggelse eller andre retslige eller administrative skridt.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: For the purposes of any claim against the Registrar under Article 28(1) or Article 44, the claimant shall be entitled to access to such information and documents as are necessary to enable the claimant to pursue its claim.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Med henblik på enhver sag, der anlægges mod den rettighedsregistrerende myndighed i medfør af artikel 28, stk. 1, eller artikel 44, har sagsøgeren ret til adgang til de oplysninger og dokumenter, som måtte være nødvendige for at føre sagen.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Supervisory Authority may waive the inviolability and immunity conferred by paragraph 4.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Tilsynsmyndigheden kan ophæve den ved stk. 4 indrømmede ukrænkelighed og immunitet.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Liability of the Registrar

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Den rettighedsregistrerende myndigheds ansvar

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 28 — Liability and financial assurances

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 28 — Erstatningsansvar og erhvervsansvarsforsikring

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Registrar shall be liable for compensatory damages for loss suffered by a person directly resulting from an error or omission of the Registrar and its officers and employees or from a malfunction of the international registration system except where the malfunction is caused by an event of an inevitable and irresistible nature, which could not be prevented by using the best practices in current use in the field of electronic registry design and operation, including those related to back-up and systems security and networking.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Den rettighedsregistrerende myndighed er erstatningsansvarlig for tab, som en person lider, når skaden er en direkte følge af den rettighedsregistrerende myndigheds eller dennes ledelses eller ansattes fejl eller undladelse eller af driftsforstyrrelser i det internationale registreringssystem, dog med undtagelse af driftsforstyrrelser forårsaget af begivenheder af uundgåelig og uafværgelig art, som ikke ville have kunnet forebygges gennem anvendelse af bedste normalt anvendte praksis for udformning og drift af elektroniske registre, herunder sådan praksis, som vedrører sikkerhedskopiering samt sikkerheds- og netopbygningssystemer.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Registrar shall not be liable under the preceding paragraph for factual inaccuracy of registration information received by the Registrar or transmitted by the Registrar in the form in which it received that information nor for acts or circumstances for which the Registrar and its officers and employees are not responsible and arising prior to receipt of registration information at the International Registry.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Den rettighedsregistrerende myndighed er ikke i medfør af stk. 1 ansvarlig for faktuelle unøjagtigheder i de oplysninger vedrørende registreringen, som den har modtaget, eller som den har videresendt i samme form, som de blev modtaget;

den rettighedsregistrerende myndighed er heller ikke ansvarlig for handlinger og forhold, som hverken sorterer under den, dens ledelse eller dens ansatte, og som ligger forud for modtagelsen af oplysningerne vedrørende registreringen i det internationale register.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Compensation under paragraph 1 may be reduced to the extent that the person who suffered the damage caused or contributed to that damage.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Den i stk. 1 omhandlede erstatning kan nedsættes, for så vidt skadelidte har forårsaget eller bidraget til skaden.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The Registrar shall procure insurance or a financial guarantee covering the liability referred to in this Article to the extent determined by the Supervisory Authority, in accordance with the Protocol.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Den rettighedsregistrerende myndighed tegner en forsikring eller skaffer sig en finansiel garanti, der dækker det i denne artikel omhandlede erstatningsansvar i et omfang, der fastsættes af tilsynsmyndigheden i overensstemmelse med protokollens bestemmelser.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Chapter VIII

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Kapitel VIII

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Effects of an international interest as against third parties

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En international sikkerhedsrettigheds retsvirkninger over for tredjemand

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Article 29 — Priority of competing interests

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Artikel 29 — Konkurrerende sikkerhedsrettigheders prioritetsorden

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: A registered interest has priority over any other interest subsequently registered and over an unregistered interest.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En registreret sikkerhedsrettighed står foran enhver senere registreret sikkerhedsrettighed og enhver uregistreret sikkerhedsrettighed.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The priority of the first-mentioned interest under the preceding paragraph applies:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Den foranstående plads i prioritetsordenen, som i medfør af stk. 1 tilkommer den først registrerede sikkerhedsrettighed, gælder:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: even if the first-mentioned interest was acquired or registered with actual knowledge of the other interest;
and

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: a)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: selv om den anden sikkerhedsrettighed allerede var kendt på det tidspunkt, hvor den først registrerede sikkerhedsrettighed blev stiftet eller registreret, og

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: even as regards value given by the holder of the first-mentioned interest with such knowledge.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: b)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: selv for ethvert forskud, som indehaveren af den først registrerede sikkerhed med fuldt kendskab til den anden sikkerhedsrettighed måtte erlægge.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The buyer of an object acquires its interest in it:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Køber erhverver rettigheder i formuegenstanden:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: subject to an interest registered at the time of its acquisition of that interest;
and

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: a)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: med forbehold af enhver sikkerhedsrettighed, der er registreret på erhvervelsestidspunktet, og

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: free from an unregistered interest even if it has actual knowledge of such an interest.

Linea.Char: frigjort for enhver uregistreret sikkerhedsrettighed, også selv om køber havde kendskab til en sådan rettighed.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The conditional buyer or lessee acquires its interest in or right over that object:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En køber med forbehold eller en lejer erhverver rettigheder i formuegenstanden:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: subject to an interest registered prior to the registration of the international interest held by its conditional seller or lessor;
and

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: a)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: med forbehold af enhver sikkerhedsrettighed, der er registreret inden registreringen af den internationale sikkerhedsrettighed, som indehaves af sælgeren med forbehold eller udlejeren, og

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: b)

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: frigjort fra enhver på dette tidspunkt uregistreret sikkerhedsrettighed, også selv om køberen eller lejeren var vidende om en sådan sikkerhedsrettighed.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: The priority of competing interests or rights under this Article may be varied by agreement between the holders of those interests, but an assignee of a subordinated interest is not bound by an agreement to subordinate that interest unless at the time of the assignment a subordination had been registered relating to that agreement.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Indehaverne af konkurrerende sikkerhedsrettigheder eller rettigheder kan aftale at ændre prioritetsordenen for deres respektive rettigheder, således som den fremkommer ved denne artikel.
En efterstående sikkerhedsrettigheds cessionar er dog ikke bundet af en aftale om rykning, medmindre den rykning, der følger af en sådan aftale, blev registreret ved overdragelsen.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Any priority given by this Article to an interest in an object extends to proceeds.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: En sikkerhedsrettigheds plads i prioritetsordenen, således som den fremkommer ved denne artikel, gælder tilsvarende for erstatningsprovenuer.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: This Convention:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: Denne konvention:

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: does not affect the rights of a person in an item, other than an object, held prior to its installation on an object if under the applicable law those rights continue to exist after the installation;
and

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: berører ikke rettigheder, som en person havde i et andet gode end en formuegenstand inden dettes montering på en formuegenstand, hvis disse rettigheder i medfør af den lov, der finder anvendelse, fortsat eksisterer efter monteringen, og

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: does not prevent the creation of rights in an item, other than an object, which has previously been installed on an object where under the applicable law those rights are created.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;

Linea.Char: hindrer ikke stiftelse af rettigheder i et andet gode end en formuegenstand, som forinden er blevet monteret på en formuegenstand, når i medfør af den lov, der finder anvendelse, sådanne rettigheder stiftes.

Td.style: border-top: 0pt none #000000; border-left: 0pt none #000000; border-bottom: 0pt none #000000; border-right: 0pt none #000000;
